about_the_game:
Uncover the mystery of the girl's survival journey across the wilderness. Can she overcome the wild and return home? Start a heart-racing open-world adventure in "Girl vs Wild" through the untamed wilderness. As you sprint through stunning scenery, take part in exciting action – the thick forest, hot desert, strange caves, and old bridges. Rush against the clock, beat obstacles, and defeat wild enemies in a non-stop quest where each move matters. Get ready for a thrill- packed journey with a 3D survival game that tests your quick thinking, planning, and ability to stay alive.

Survival Mode

Step into a hostile wilderness where every second is critical. Survival hinges on resource management — gathering food, water, and medicinal herbs while fending off wildlife. Adapt to diverse environments like forests, deserts, and snowfields, utilising weapons such as axes, swords, and stones to endure. The persistent threat of wild animals and environmental dangers like collapsing trees, fog, and night climates make this mode a true test of your resourcefulness and endurance.

Arena Mode

Enter the Arena where humans and animals fight in a wild boss showdown to survive. Animals like gorillas, tigers, and elephants strike from every angle, and the girl and her family have to beat them back while dodging deadly traps such as water holes, tumbling rocks, and falling trees. The arena's risks grow with each stage giving you fast thrilling action where living depends on quick choices and fighting skills.

Sniper Mode

Here, precision is key. As animals take on the role of snipers, they must eliminate humans who abuse animals within a given time limit. Players need to avoid hitting animals while watching out for moving obstacles like crisscrossing birds and running creatures. With different landscapes such as snow, desert, and forest, the sniper experience intensifies as levels progress, demanding accuracy and strategic thinking.

Cross Bridge Mode

Players must navigate treacherous bridges that span dangerous environments like deep forests, frozen caves, and deadly deserts. Along the way, they face attacks from sea animals and birds while completing critical tasks like rescuing trapped creatures and humans. As the girl progresses through each environment, she must balance speed with survival, racing against time to reach her home while overcoming every obstacle nature throws at her.

Cave Mode

Plunge into the heart of darkness, where narrow passages, eerie sounds, and lurking dangers await at every corner. You'll encounter hidden traps like spider webs, falling rocks, and vicious creatures. The cave's natural hazards keep you on edge as you battle bats and other wild animals, all while trying to rescue humans and animals. The dark environment will test your survival instincts, strategy, and courage as you fight to find your way out.

Unravel Mystery

Girl vs Wild embarks on an unforgettable journey through a vast, open-world wilderness where every decision impacts your survival. Unravel the mystery behind the girl's trip, why she faces relentless enemies and conquers unpredictable environments. The journey is full of danger, only your wits, skills, and reflexes will help you survive. Will she overcome the wild and find her way home, or fall prey to the dangers lurking in the untamed world?

Dynamic Immersive Gameplay

Explore breathtaking 3D landscapes, from dense forests to scorching deserts, mysterious caves, and deadly bridges. In this open-world environment, adapt to dynamic changes like shifting weather, day/night cycles, and unexpected wildlife encounters. The game's mechanics allow for seamless graphics, whether you're running, attacking, or dodging dangers.

Challenge The Wild

Each environment presents new and unique obstacles. You'll dodge rolling stones, survive sudden bird and animal attacks, and solve tricky rescue missions. These thrilling encounters force you to adapt and strategise, ensuring a non-stop, heart-pounding adventure where every action matters.

Tools of Survival

Equip yourself with a variety of survival tools that cater to different situations, from axes and swords to stones. Every tool is a lifeline in the wilderness, helping you defend against wild animals or solve environmental puzzles. Collecting items like coins and fruits adds another layer of strategy, as it unlocks abilities and upgrades crucial for survival.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Distribution Released After 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Distribution Released After 2020
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 (Compatibility) or macOS 10.15
  • Processor: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: x86_64 or ARM CPU (Apple Silicon)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 or Later
  • Processor: M1 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

name: Girl vs Wild

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full OpenGL 3.3 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board

short_description: As a safari animal attack survivor, the girl finds herself in a deadly forest battling to stay alive against the wilderness and reach home. Rush against the clock, beat obstacles, and defeat wild enemies in a non-stop quest where each move matters.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese*, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
